players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we remain vigilant and work together to uncover any suspicious behavior."
You: "I'm shocked by Diana's death. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I suggest we all share our thoughts on what happened and look for any inconsistencies in behavior."
Bob: "I agree with both Charlie and Alice. Let's all be open about our observations and any concerns we have. It's important that we work together to uncover the truth."
Bob: "I remember seeing Diana talking to the mafioso, Alice, during the day yesterday. I thought it was strange and worth mentioning."
You: "Bob, that's a serious accusation but I'm confused - we all just met when the game started, there was no 'yesterday' to reference. Are you trying to mislead us with false information?"
